ArtifactName: Fashion A History From the 18th to the 20th Century, Kyoto Costume Institute

MetaData.Author: Akiko Fukai
MetaData.Details: Published in January 2006 by Barnes & Noble, Inc., in collaboration with Taschen GmbH, this 736-page hardcover book, Fashion: A History from the 18th to the 20th Century, provides an extensive overview of clothing trends over three centuries. Compiled by the Kyoto Costume Institute, which houses one of the world’s largest and most renowned fashion collections, the book features photographs from the Institute’s archives. It includes a wide variety of garments such as outerwear, undergarments, footwear, and accessories, all carefully arranged and displayed on custom-made mannequins to showcase their design and historical significance.
MetaData.Content: 18th to the 20th Century Garment Photograph from the Kyoto Costume Institute
MetaData.Publisher: Barnes & Noble, Inc. by arrangement with Taschen GmbH
